alert.note: Alert for Clay; Early (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 6:02PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Henry, south central Clay and northwestern Early Counties through 645 PM EDT/545 PM CDT/... At 602 PM EDT/502 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southeast of Abbeville, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Haleburg, Bluffton, Colomokee, Harrisons Mill, Barnes, Miller, Ferrell Crossroads, Hardwickburg, Zetto, Hayes and Kolomoki Mounds Sp. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
